verses.verse: <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> makes the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1238>empty,<s%> and makes it <S%H1110>waste,<s%> and <S%H5753>turns<s%> it <S%H5921>upside<s%> <S%H6440><s%> down, and <S%H6327>scatters<s%> <S%H6327>abroad<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof.

And it shall be, as with the <S%H5971>people,<s%> so with the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> as with the <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so with his <S%H113>master;<s%> as with the <S%H8198>maid,<s%> so with her <S%H1404>mistress;<s%> as with the <S%H7069>buyer,<s%> so with the <S%H4376>seller;<s%> as with the <S%H3867>lender,<s%> so with the <S%H3867>borrower;<s%> as with the taker of <S%H5383>usury,<s%> so with the giver of <S%H5378>usury<s%> to him.
The <S%H776>land<s%> shall be utterly <S%H1238>emptied,<s%> and utterly <S%H962>spoiled:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%> and <S%H5034>fades<s%> away, the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H535>languishes<s%> and <S%H5034>fades<s%> away, the <S%H4791>haughty<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> do <S%H535>languish.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> also is <S%H2610>defiled<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof; <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H2498>changed<s%> the <S%H2706>ordinance,<s%> <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> has the <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein are <S%H816>desolate:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H2787>burned,<s%> and <S%H4213>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7604>left.<s%>
The <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H535>languishes,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the merry <S%H8056>hearted<s%> <S%H3820><s%> do <S%H584>sigh.<s%>

The <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> <S%H7673>ceases,<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of them that <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> <S%H2308>ends,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3658>harp<s%> <S%H7673>ceases.<s%>
They shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H7892>song;<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> shall be <S%H4843>bitter<s%> to them that <S%H8354>drink<s%> it.
The <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%> down: <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H5462>shut<s%> up, that no <S%H935>man<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> in.

There is a <S%H6682>crying<s%> for <S%H3196>wine<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> is <S%H6150>darkened,<s%> the <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1540>gone.<s%>
In the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H8179>gate<s%> is <S%H3807>smitten<s%> with <S%H7591>destruction.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> it shall be in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> there shall be as the <S%H5363>shaking<s%> of an <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree, and as the <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> grapes <S%H518>when<s%> the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> is <S%H3615>done.<s%>

They shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> they shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> they shall <S%H6670>cry<s%> <S%H6670>aloud<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H217>fires,<s%> even the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

From the <S%H3671>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have we <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2158>songs,<s%> even <S%H6643>glory<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> But I <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H7334>leanness,<s%> my <S%H7334>leanness,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> to me! the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> dealers have dealt <S%H898>treacherously;<s%> yes, the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> dealers have dealt <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously.<s%>
<S%H6343>Fear,<s%> and the <S%H6354>pit,<s%> and the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> are on you, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that he who <S%H5127>flees<s%> from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6343>fear<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6354>pit;<s%> and he that <S%H5927>comes<s%> up out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6354>pit<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare:<s%> for the <S%H699>windows<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%> are <S%H6605>open,<s%> and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> do <S%H7493>shake.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> is utterly <S%H7489>broken<s%> down, the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H6565>clean<s%> <S%H6565>dissolved,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4132>moved<s%> exceedingly.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5128>reel<s%> to and fro like a <S%H7910>drunkard,<s%> and shall be <S%H5110>removed<s%> like a <S%H4412>cottage;<s%> and the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> thereof shall be <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on it; and it shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and not <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H3254>again.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4791>high<s%> ones that are on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And they shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> together, as <S%H616>prisoners<s%> are <S%H626>gathered<s%> in the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> up in the <S%H4525>prison,<s%> and after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they be <S%H6485>visited.<s%>

Then the <S%H3842>moon<s%> shall be <S%H2659>confounded,<s%> and the <S%H2535>sun<s%> <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5048>before<s%> his <S%H2204>ancients<s%> <S%H3519>gloriously.<s%>
